attributes.action: Abolish the draconian law that prevents me from buying a bottle of methylated spirits on a Sunday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I recently attempted to buy some methylated spirit from my local DIY chain store.  I needed it for my camping stove.  I was told by a member of staff that the store couldn't sell me the stuff because it was a Sunday!  What's that all about?
